original_text: Zebulun shall dwell at the haven of the sea; and he shall be for an haven of ships; and his border shall be unto Zidon.
korean_text: 스불론은 해변에 거주하리니 그 곳은 배 매는 해변이라 그의 경계가 시돈까지리로다

sentences.original_text: Zebulun shall dwell at the haven of the sea
and he shall be for an haven of ships
and his border shall be unto Zidon
